configuration.name: Experiment: NTuple TD w0.5 BEST STATISTICS

option.name: PROGRAM_PARAMETERS
option.value: experimentDirName=NTuple-BestTDL experimentClassNameList=[ConfigNTupleBasicLinear_32768,ConfigNTupleBasicTanH_32768] createLogs=false canCollectStatistics=false repetitions=1 maxTrainingThreads=8 gamesToPlay=1000000 gamesToPlayPerThreadForStats=1000 saveEvery=2000 saveBackupEvery=25000 statisticsOnly=true simulationsForStatistics=8 tileToWinForStatistics=2048 runBackupStatistics=true lambdaList=[0.0,0.1,0.2,0.3,0.4] eligibilityTraceLength=-1 replacingTraces=true accumulatingTraces=false annealingAlphaList=[400000] alphaList=[0.005] gammaList=[1] concurrentLayerList=[false,false] computeBestPossibleActionConcurrently=false whenStartToExplore=[0.5] explorationRateInitialValueList=[0.005] explorationRateFinalValuesList=[0.0005] explorationRateStartInterpolationList=[0] explorationRateFinishInterpolationList=[400000]
